1.<center>アストルティア上空に現れた 浮遊都市……|天星郷フォーリオンへ:
A floating city that appeared above|Astoltia... Euliza, who claimed to be an|angel of guidance, invited us to the|
|Celestial City of Forion... There, she is|told to obtain a great power that will allow|her to protect the world, and she uses the|
|Candlestick of Souls to travel to the|Celestial City, but suddenly, it is|mysteriously attacked and crashes...

2.<center>墜落した先は 白灰の試練場と呼ばれる|浮島だった。審判の天使 ヘ:
I crashed on a floating island called the|White Ash Proving Ground... Helvel, the Angel|of Judgment, told me that if I wanted to|
|attain great power, I must take on the ordeal|of the Four Star Tour... If you cooperate|with the ogre hero, Lada Gert, and pass the|
|White Ash Ordeal and reach the city of|angels, the divine city of Forion, you will|be challenged to complete three more|
|ordeals...

3.<center>黄金 深翠 紺碧の ３つの試練場では|大地の三闘士 カブ ナンナ:
In the three test centers of gold, green, and|azure, you will meet heroes such as Kabu,|Nanna, and Dortham, the three fighters of the|
|earth, Hakuou, the second Time Champion, and|Linashe, the Diva of the Origin. After|passing the ordeal and completing the four|
|star tours, you will be taken to the Sacred|Plot to meet the chief of the angels, the|Chief Angel...

4.<center>天使長ミトラーに命じられ みそぎを|しようとすると 泉が汚染され:
Angel Chief Mithra ordered him to perform|miso rituals, but the fountain became|contaminated... The twin heroes, Ashley, the|
|elder brother of the first hero, and Leone,|the younger brother of the first ally,|cooperate to purify the Fountain... When all|
|the heroes had finished miso miso cleaning,|the chief angel revealed that the great power|is to turn heroes into gods in human form...

5.<center>神化の儀の準備を待つ間 ユーライザに|同僚の天使 アルビデを捜し:
While waiting for the preparation of the|Divination Ceremony, Euliza asked me to find|my colleague, the angel Alvide, and I|
|discovered his body deep within the remains|of the Gods of the past... Euliza told him|that the stone on Albide's left hand was the|
|same as the one dropped by the demon that had|polluted the fountain, but he could not find|it... The death was ruled an accident, and|
|the apotheosis ceremony went on as planned...
